title: TN_SC_WRITE_EOS Function Module
description:
TN_SC_WRITE_EOS passes at the end position of the last, with 

TN_SC_WRITE or TN_SC_WRITE_EOS issued text, the text Ist_STRING with 

the color of Iby_ATTR.

This allows to continuous passes texts without the need to always pass the 

new coordinates.
name: TN_SC_WRITE_EOS

input.name: Iby_ATTR
input.description: Color code representing the font color.

input.name: Ist_STRING
input.description: The text to be written to the screen.

in/out.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
in/out.description: Screen structure that holds the current state of the display.
